Title: Choosing Products to Sell on Xiaohongshu
Content: When selecting products to sell on Xiaohongshu, it's crucial to consider the preferences of the platform's primary user base, which is predominantly female. Popular categories include clothing, shoes, bags, beauty products, and accessories. However, new sellers should be cautious with clothing, shoes, and bags due to high return rates, which can be as high as 40-50%. Beauty products, especially branded items like eyeshadows and eyebrow pencils, offer good opportunities but require a reliable supply chain. Accessories, particularly those priced under 50 yuan, can be a good entry point due to lower competition and higher chances of becoming popular. Always research and benchmark against competitors to set appropriate prices and manage expectations.

Title: Selling Food Products on Xiaohongshu
Content: Selling food products on Xiaohongshu can be lucrative but requires careful planning. Categories include fruits, snacks, and local specialties. Fruits like apples and mangoes are popular, but it's essential to benchmark prices against competitors to avoid losses due to high return rates and after-sales issues. Snacks and local specialties require a business license and a food safety certificate. Focus on products that encourage repeat purchases, such as high-quality fruits or unique local snacks. Keep prices low initially to attract customers and ensure the products are visually appealing and tasty to encourage repeat business. Building a reliable supply chain is crucial to maintain quality and customer satisfaction.

Title: Leveraging High-Engagement Categories
Content: High-engagement categories on Xiaohongshu include beauty tools, fitness equipment, and household gadgets. Beauty tools like facial rollers and gua sha boards, fitness equipment like resistance bands, and household gadgets like cleaning and storage solutions are popular due to their practical use and high engagement potential. When selling these products, focus on creating content that demonstrates their use and benefits. For example, show how a cleaning gadget can simplify household chores or how a fitness tool can enhance workouts. This approach not only attracts viewers but also encourages them to save and share your posts, increasing your reach and potential sales. Ensure your products are competitively priced and of high quality to build trust and encourage repeat purchases.
